message: Let's split it 60/40, a fair start!

Hi Alice – to avoid further losses from inflation, I propose a near‐fair split. With both of us losing 5% value each round, accepting this division (512820 for me and 487180 for you) ensures we both secure our best possible value without delay. I look forward to a swift agreement!
Bob, your loss due to inflation is increasing. Accept this offer to minimize your losses.
